comment: The sum of the degrees of all vertices of a finite simple graph is twice the size of the graph. See equation (1) in section I.1 in [Bollobas] p. 4. Also known as the "First Theorem of Graph Theory" (see ~ https://charlesreid1.com/wiki/First_Theorem_of_Graph_Theory ). (Contributed by AV, 26-Dec-2021.)
